00090 void commit_reg_options(struct opt_odb_t * odb, struct core_knobs_t * knobs)
00091 {
00092   opt_reg_int(odb, "-rob:size","number of reorder buffer entries [DS]",
00093       &knobs->commit.ROB_size, /*default*/ knobs->commit.ROB_size, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00094   opt_reg_int(odb, "-commit:width","maximum number of uops committed per cycle [DS]",
00095       &knobs->commit.width, /*default*/ knobs->commit.width, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00096   opt_reg_int(odb, "-commit:branches","maximum number of branches committed per cycle [D]",
00097       &knobs->commit.branch_limit, /*default*/ knobs->commit.branch_limit, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00098 }

00116 class core_commit_t * commit_create(const char * commit_opt_string, struct core_t * core)
00117 {
00118 #define ZESTO_PARSE_ARGS
00119 #include "ZPIPE-commit.list"
00120 
00121   fatal("unknown commit type \"%s\"",commit_opt_string);

00123 }
